story.text: This is a gaming oriented instance founded by Maiyannah Bishop in 2016. Since the development activity of GNU Social proceeded at a glacial pace a fork was created for this site called PostActiv.
PostActiv improved the code base of GNU Social to make it more performant and also replaced message queues which had previously been handled by mysql with a faster redis version.

Highland Arrow was an early example of how gaming communities could make use of the fediverse. For a long time gamers had been accustomed to doing things like hosting servers for VoIP or multi-player games, so using the fediverse was a logical extension of that tradition.

This is a gaming oriented instance founded by Maiyannah Bishop in 2016. Since the development activity of GNU Social proceeded at a glacial pace a fork was created for this site called PostActiv.
PostActiv improved the code base of GNU Social to make it more performant and also replaced message queues which had previously been handled by mysql with a faster redis version.

Highland Array was an early example of how gaming communities could make use of the fediverse. For a long time gamers had been used to doing things like hosting servers for things like VoIP or multi-player games, so using the fediverse was a logical extension of that tradition.
